name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven **Full Stack Engineer** with 10+ years of experience in developing high-performance software solutions for healthcare and finance. Proficient in **Go**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **TypeScript**, with hands-on expertise in **Kubernetes**, **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure** for building **cloud-native environments**. Skilled in **CI/CD** processes, **GitOps**, and **Docker**, leveraging **microservices architecture** for scalable applications. Experienced in **API design** and optimizing **cloud billing models**, including Savings Plans (SPs), Commitment Usage Discounts (CUDs), and Reserved Instances (RIs).

Possess a solid background in databases such as **BigQuery**, **ClickHouse**, and **Firestore**, coupled with strong communication and collaboration skills that enhance team productivity. Proven ability to lead enterprise platforms incorporating AI/ML capabilities for real-time analytics, automation, and intelligent decision-making. Committed to developing solutions that comply with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, and PCI DSS, while focusing on secure and maintainable architectures. Passionate about impactful tech systems, supported by practical MLOps experience using tools like MLflow, Airflow, and Kubeflow.

• Developed microservices architectures employing **Kubernetes**, **Docker**, and cloud platforms, including **AWS** and **GCP**, optimizing for high availability and resource efficiency.
• Built and maintained CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitOps** principles for streamlined deployments and integration processes across diverse cloud services.
• Leveraged **Azure** and **GCP** for efficient cloud billing models, cost optimization strategies, and monitoring of Savings Plans and Reserved Instances (RIs).
• Managed databases such as **BigQuery**, **ClickHouse**, and **Firestore** to ensure optimal data queries and storage solutions for both healthcare and financial applications.
• Demonstrated strong **communication** and **collaboration skills** with cross-functional teams to create intuitive user interfaces, enhancing user experience in applications built with **React** (17–18) and **Node.js**.
• Engineered and optimized microservices and applications for performance and scaling, reducing load times by up to **50%** using modern web frameworks and cloud orchestration tools.
• Integrated advanced data analytics and visualization tools, such as **Chart.js** and **D3.js**, providing real-time insights into transaction trends and operational KPIs for end-users.
• Established enterprise-level testing strategies using **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **Postman**, covering unit, integration, and end-to-end tests to ensure deployment robustness across front-end and back-end services.
• Collaborated with data scientists and engineers to create pipelines facilitating machine learning model deployment, resulting in a **30%** increase in predictive capability and user engagement.

- Designed and implemented cloud-native applications using **Node.js** and **React (18)**, enhancing team efficiencies by up to **30%** through optimized API design for financial platforms.
- Developed microservices architectures utilizing **Docker** and **Kubernetes** to ensure seamless deployment cycles and facilitate CI/CD best practices, reducing deployment time by **50%**.

- Leveraged **TypeScript** and modern frontend frameworks including **Next.js** and **Vue 3** to create user-centric interfaces, increasing user engagement metrics significantly.
- Ensured version control and collaborative development using **GitOps** methodologies, improving code quality and reducing integration issues by **20%**.

Designed and optimized backend services leveraging **Node.js** to create scalable microservices that enhance the overall architecture for a global e-commerce platform.
Developed and deployed frontend applications utilizing **React** to provide responsive user experiences, achieving a 30% reduction in page load time on both web and mobile platforms.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines using **Docker**, enhancing deployment frequency by 40% while ensuring seamless integration and testing within **Kubernetes** environments.
Engineered real-time features using **API design** and event-driven architecture to deliver responsive order updates, improving customer satisfaction by 25%.
Integrated cloud solutions with **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure**, optimizing cloud billing models including Savings Plans, resulting in a 15% reduction in operational costs.
Leveraged **databases** like MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and **BigQuery** for efficient data storage and retrieval, ensuring low latency and high availability across e-commerce workflows.

Developed cloud-native applications that utilize **microservices** architecture, supporting efficient scaling and management of resources across various cloud environments.
